title: Asynchronous Learning Modules for Enhancing Information Literacy and Research Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic academic writing and research skills
context.additional_context: A program enhancing core competencies—information evaluation, academic resource utilization, research ethics—in a university library-based virtual learning environment

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate credible academic sources from scholarly databases with 90% accuracy
Learners can format reference lists in APA/MLA styles with 100% accuracy
Learners can incorporate interliterary connections in designing research questions by topic with over 70% consistency
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
